    Method
    Description
    static StockData
    StockDataFetcher.fetchFromCSV(String path, String ticker)
    Fetches stock data from a local CSV file.
    static StockData
    StockDataFetcher.fetchIntraday7DaysFromYahoo(String symbol)
    Fetches up to 7 days of intraday (by-the-minute) data from Yahoo Finance.
    static StockData
    StockDataFetcher.fetchStockData(String ticker)
    Fetches stock data from external APIs (Yahoo Finance, AlphaVantage, MarketStack), in that order of priority.

    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    PredictionResult
    The PredictionResult class extends StockData and represents the result of a stock price prediction.

    Modifier and Type
    Method

    Calculates the linear regression line prediction for the given stock data.

    Calculates the Simple Moving Average (SMA) prediction for the given stock data over the specified period.
    StockData
    PredictionManager.smoothing(StockData data, double alpha, double beta)
    Applies Holt's linear exponential smoothing to the given stock data using the specified alpha (level smoothing) and beta (trend smoothing) parameters.

    static PredictionResult
    Prediction.predictFutureHybrid(StockData stockData, double sentimentScore)
    Generates a sequence of hybrid future predictions by iteratively predicting the next point using a combination of SMA, linear regression, Holt smoothing, and sentiment adjustments.

  • Uses of StockData in sentiment

    Methods in sentiment with parameters of type StockData
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    double
    SentimentManager.analyzeSentimentFor(StockData data)
    Fetches news headlines for the given stock data's ticker symbol, analyzes the sentiment of those headlines, caches the results, and returns the sentiment score.
    double
    SentimentManager.getSentiment(StockData data)
    Convenience method to fetch news headlines and directly compute the sentiment score for the given stock data without caching the results.
